content: In a Custom room, the main link is valid for an unlimited time period. You can create additional links with time limit.

comment.text: "In a Custom room, the main link is valid for an unlimited time period. This message explains that creating separate links with limited time periods is also available. It appears in edit link panel components."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Şəxsi otaqda" is a literal translation of "In a Custom room" but sounds unnatural in Azerbaijani. "Xüsusi otaqda" would be more appropriate as it accurately translates "Custom room".

The English phrase 'main link' could be better translated to reflect the nuance of a primary link or a base link. "Əsas link" is a possible translation, but a more descriptive term might improve clarity.
The phrase "Հատուկ սենյակում" translates to "In a special room" instead of "In a Custom room". "Հատուկ" implies special, not custom.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հատուկ սենյակում should be replaced with something like "Պատվերով սենյակում" or a similar term that accurately conveys "Custom room".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The overall phrasing of "գործում է անսահմանափակ ժամկետով" is slightly awkward and doesn't completely match the meaning of "valid for an unlimited time period." While not strictly incorrect, it lacks the clarity of the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "ևավերջ անվավերության ժամկետով" or "չունի ժամկետ" to better capture the "unlimited time period" meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'In a Custom room' is translated as 'ໃນຫ້ອງທີ່ກຳນົດຄຸ້ນ'. While technically correct, 'ໃນຫ້ອງທີ່ກຳນົດ' would be a more natural and common phrasing in Lao for 'In a Custom room'. 'ຄຸ້ນ' implies familiarity or customization which is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃນຫ້ອງທີ່ສ້າງຕັ້ງຂື້ນເອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'main link' is translated as 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຕົ້ນ'. While understandable, 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຫຼັກ' would be a more direct and common translation of 'main link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ຫຼັກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'අභිරුචි' (abiruchi) is a loanword and while understandable, 'අභිරුචි' is more commonly used for 'custom'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අභිරුචි කාමරයක් (abiruchi kamarayak) should be සුවපහසු කාමරයක් (suwapahasu kamarayak) or වෙනස් කළ හැකි කාමරයක් (venas kalak kay kamarayak) depending on the desired nuance. Abiruchi is acceptable, but less common.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'කාල සීමාවක් සමඟ අමතර සබැඳි නිර්මාණය කළ හැකිය' can be improved for better flow. It literally translates to 'You can create additional links with a time limit'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාල සීමාවක් සහිත අමතර සබැඳි නිර්මාණය කරගත හැකිය (Kaal seemawaak sathith amaithra sabanda nirmanakara gathay) - This translates to 'You can create additional links with a time limit' but sounds more natural in Sinhala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'unlimited time period' is not the most natural translation of 'unlimited time' in this context. A more fluent translation would be 'brez časovne omejitve'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V sobi po meri je glavna povezava veljavna brez časovne omejitve.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Ustvarite lahko dodatne povezave' could be improved to sound more natural. 'Lahko ustvarite dodatne povezave' is a better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V sobi po meri je glavna povezava veljavna brez časovne omejitve. Lahko ustvarite dodatne povezave s časovno omejitvijo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "In a Custom room" is best translated as "У прилагођеној просторији" rather than "У прилагођеној соби." While 'soba' can mean room, 'prostorija' is more commonly used in this context and sounds more natural.
The phrase 'In a Custom room' is a bit awkward in Vietnamese. A more natural translation would be something like 'Trong phòng tùy chỉnh' or 'Trong một phòng tùy chỉnh'.

The translation of 'main link' as 'liên kết chính' is technically correct, but could be improved for clarity. Considering the context, 'liên kết chính' might not be immediately obvious to a Vietnamese speaker.
'additional links' could be translated more naturally. 'liên kết bổ sung' is correct, but could be rephrased for better flow.
